instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> if charger is plug in the power button works fine if it not plug in and i press power button nothing i have to hold it for a long time 
with a usb current meter i see it turn on then off then on again

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
threads.message:
Any history available?
Did PRAM reset?
Tried known good battery?
Battery is charging?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
threads.message: yes did a pram reset and battery is good and charging if i hold the power button for 10 seconds with out power card it will turn on with power cord it turns on 2 seconds

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
threads.message: With battery connected, pressing long time power button, does it start with fan at max speed?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
threads.message: Did you really try another battery?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
threads.message: i press a long time it turns on but not with the fan fast its normal i tried a different battery same thing

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> powers button only works if pressed for a long time
threads.message:
Fan should not spin at all when board starts.
Start in diagnose mode, battery and charger connected; see if any error reported.
